description: Provide real-time, detailed information about U.S. National Parks including park details, alerts, visitor centers, campgrounds, and events. Enable users to search parks by location, activities, and other criteria to plan visits effectively. Access up-to-date alerts and operational information to enhance trip planning and safety.

npsApiKey.description: API key for the National Park Service

capabilities.name: findParks
capabilities.description: Search for national parks based on state, name, activities, or other criteria

capabilities.name: getParkDetails
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific national park

capabilities.name: getAlerts
capabilities.description: Get current alerts for national parks including closures, hazards, and important information

capabilities.name: getVisitorCenters
capabilities.description: Get information about visitor centers and their operating hours

capabilities.name: getCampgrounds
capabilities.description: Get information about available campgrounds and their amenities
